title: China's tech crackdown wreaks havoc in jobs market - Economic Times
content: China's tech crackdown wreaks havoc in jobs market  Economic Times
description: Over the past year, China has launched a relentless crackdown on big tech firms, with a raft of new regulations aimed at curbing consumer rights abuses, monopolistic market practices, breaches of consumer data privacy, protecting minors from gaming addiction and curbing content deemed socially harmful - among other things.
